name: UIViewControllerPreviewing
desc: A set of methods that define the interface for configuring a previewing view controller on devices that support 3D Touch.DeprecatedUse UIContextMenuInteraction instead.

items.name: var sourceRect: CGRect
items.desc: The rectangle, in the source view’s coordinate system, that responds to a 3D Touch by a user and remains visually sharp while surrounding content blurs.

items.name: var previewingGestureRecognizerForFailureRelationship: UIGestureRecognizer
items.desc: A gesture recognizer suitable for setting up failure requirements for a preview’s (peek’s) gestures.

items.name: var delegate: UIViewControllerPreviewingDelegate
items.desc: The previewing view controller's delegate for managing preview (peek) and commit (pop) view controllers.

items.name: var sourceView: UIView
items.desc: A source view, in a previewing view controller’s view hierarchy, responds to a 3D Touch by the user.
